CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 29,34-37 The IDT - based polymers presented deep HOMO levels and hence lead to considerably high V oc of the resulted devices.

Let's think step by step.
1. IDT-based polymers - This is the "Material Name" entity in the paragraph. IDT refers to a specific type of organic semiconductor material that is used in the construction of organic solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. IDT-based polymers - This is the relevant "Material Name" entity in the paragraph. IDT refers to a specific type of organic semiconductor material that is used in the construction of organic solar cells.

The other terms in the paragraph, such as "HOMO levels" and "V oc," are not material names. HOMO stands for highest occupied molecular orbital, and Voc stands for open-circuit voltage, which are concepts used in the field of semiconductor physics and are not material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 29,34-37 The IDT - based polymers presented deep HOMO levels and hence lead to considerably high V oc of the resulted devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. IDT-based polymers - This is the first and most prominent "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It refers to a specific type of polymers that have deep HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) levels.
2. HOMO levels - This is the second "Property Name" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in a material.

Therefore, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "IDT-based polymers" and "HOMO levels".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. IDT-based polymers - This is a material property as it refers to a specific type of polymers that have deep HOMO levels.
2. HOMO levels - This is also a material property as it refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in a material.

Therefore, the relevant material property entities in the paragraph are "IDT-based polymers" and "HOMO levels".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| IDT-based polymers |
| HOMO levels |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 29,34-37 The IDT - based polymers presented deep HOMO levels and hence lead to considerably high V oc of the resulted devices.

Let's think step by step.

1. "deep HOMO levels" - Here, HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) level is a property related to the energy levels of the IDT-based polymers.
2. "considerably high V oc" - In this context, Voc (Open-Circuit Voltage) is a property that describes the maximum voltage that can be generated by a solar cell or photodiode.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "deep HOMO levels" and "considerably high V oc".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "deep HOMO levels" - This is a value of a material property, as it refers to the energy levels of the IDT-based polymers.
2. "considerably high V oc" - This is also a value of a material property, as it describes the maximum voltage that can be generated by a solar cell or photodiode made from the IDT-based polymers.

Therefore, the relevant "Value of Material Property" entities in the paragraph are "deep HOMO levels" and "considerably high V oc".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| deep HOMO levels |
| considerably high V oc |
